-frontend-authorized-slave-string.description: List of SOFTINST-XXX of Slaves, separated by space which is allowed to use custom configuration.
-frontend-authorized-slave-string.title: Authorized Slave String

domain.description: Base Domain for create subdomains (ie.: example.com).
domain.title: Domain

global-disable-http2.description: Disables globally HTTP2 in Caddy, thus enable-http2-by-default here and enable-http2 have no effect. Rational is that in some loaded environments it is better to run Caddy without any HTTP2 capabilities.
global-disable-http2.title: Globally disable HTTP2

mpm-graceful-shutdown-timeout.description: Value passed to -grace parameter of Caddy, see https://caddyserver.com/docs/cli .
mpm-graceful-shutdown-timeout.title: Duration of the graceful shutdown period

nginx-domain.description: Base Domain for create subdomains (ie.: example2.com) for websocket, notebook and eventsource.
nginx-domain.title: Nginx Domain

public-ipv4.description: Public ipv4 of the frontend (the one Caddy will be indirectly listening to).
public-ipv4.title: Public IPv4

re6st-verification-url.description: Url to verify if the internet and/or re6stnet is working.
re6st-verification-url.title: Test Verification URL

enable-quic.description: Enables QUIC - Quick UDP Internet Connections. Note that this is experimental feature, thus can result in undefined behaviour.
enable-quic.title: Enable QUIC

automatic-internal-kedifa-caucase-csr.description: Automatically signs CSRs sent to KeDiFa's caucase, based on csr_id and matching certificate.
automatic-internal-kedifa-caucase-csr.title: Automatic Internal KeDiFa's Caucase CSR
